overview: Mike Milord is the co-founder and CEO of Zaawi Software Ltd. Mike studied Mechanical Engineering in Mulhouse, a medium-sized city in Alsace (eastern France). After working in Germany, Mike quickly realised that he would like to be in a job that allowed him to be more creative. So, after a short spell teaching in the UK, he went back to school and studied Marketing and Business at Bradford University (UK) where he won the ‘Best Business Idea’, a competition run by the University and Bradford Council. After university, Mike went to Dubai and worked as a Marketing Manager; he then became Head of Marketing representing (through Al-Kamda) top brands such as Power Plate®, Nautilus® and StairMaster® in the Middle East and North Africa. While in Dubai, Mike started ‘M3D MediaCom’, a consulting company that helped businesses with their communications needs.
